§ 41301. Requirement for a permit A foreign air carrier may provide foreign air transportation only if the foreign air carrier holds a permit issued under this chapter authorizing the foreign air transportation. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 1126.)

RevisedSectionSource (U.S. Code)Source (Statutes at Large)
